name: "Saintly Triangle on the Head" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Gel pen on notebook page with digital embellishments and color.] The tiny, saintly triangle appeared in our reality for only a few moments (truly innocent creatures are molecularly unstable) before fizzling into the negative zone, but in the few precious moments before he evaporated, we decided to collaborate on a T.V. series pitch that should knock everyone's socks off! Stay tuned for more! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
